original_text: While I was watching, the little horn attacked God's holy people. It was winning the fight against them. While I was watching, the little horn attacked God's holy people. It was winning the fight against them.
korean_text: 내가 본즉 이 뿔이 성도들과 더불어 싸워 그들에게 이겼더니

sentences.original_text: the little horn attacked God's holy people
sentences.korean_translation: 작은 뿔이 하나님의 거룩한 백성을 공격했다

sentences.original_text: It was winning the fight against them
